The London Shakes

The Plaza, Infocity square, Patia, Bhubaneswar

Click to read full Review
An urban cafeteria with an on-the-go approach towards snacking, it offers a wide range of shakes as well as quick bites on the menu. It is a casual spot with chilled out vibes with a limited seating space and an amazing, super-cordial staff. The shakes are served in takeaway glass bottles and the grub is also offered in easy-to-carry paper containers. Economical pricing and quick service further helps increase the appeal. Recommended - White Pasta, Thick Shake.

One Peg Down

Sailashree Vihar, Bhubaneswar

Click to read full Review
It is a spacious place that especially comes to life at the later hours of the day. The Dance floor is full of people having fun and dancing their heart out. The food menu is panned across cuisines and anything you pick is an absolute delight. The drinks menu has a wide variety of options and you are sure to find something that will please your heart. Open till late, it is perfect for your next night out session wit your gang!

Tea Pot

MayFair Lagoon, JaydevVihar, Bhubaneswar

Click to read full Review
TEA POT is a multi-cuisine 24 hour restaurant well-known for their superb buffet spreads. The spacious restaurant gets its name from an eclectic collection of tea pots which forms a part of the dÃ©cor. As for the food, there is something to sate every palate including North Indian, South Indian, Chinese, Continental and Regional dishes. Sunday brunches are very popular at Tea Pot.

Click to read full Review

The way to someoneâ€™s heart is not difficult but it can always be reached with the aid of good food. Bringing the cuisines from the Italian coastal city of Naples, Brick and Clay restaurant plans to experiment with the flavours of Italy with the local delicacies.
